display_long_description:
# The Obstacle Course Game You’ve Been Waiting For!

**RUN, JUMP, PUNCH & SMASH** your way through 40+ levels and dungeons in this retro-themed VR platformer & obstacle course game. Filled with tough challenges, inventive obstacles, treasures to collect and secrets to discover.

[media]

# 7 Worlds To Discover

- Honeywood Hills
- Cookie Crumble
- Sky Brick Road
- Jump N' Jammy
- Arctic Freeze
- Dark Citadel 
- Cybertron

[media]

# Easy To Pickup And Play

- Play Seated or Standing.
- Movement - Left & Right Thumbsticks.
- Jump - A Button or Click Right Thumbstick.
- Dash - Click Left Thumbstick.
- Ground Smash - While in Air, Press Trigger.

[media]
# Face the final challenge. Enter each of the 7 Dungeons and see if you have what it takes to unlock the next world.
- Untimed so you can progress at your own pace.
- Reach the gates to unlock checkpoints.
- Dungeons designed with platforming in mind.

[media]
# Race To The Finish Line!
- Race against your own time.
- Compete to achieve Bronze, Silver or Gold Trophies!
- You aren't penalized for a lack of skill.
- As long as you can complete each course, you can progress!
- Keep practicing and you'll do GREAT!

- Play Seated or Standing.
- Movement - Left & Right Thumbsticks.
- Jump - A Button or Click Right Thumbstick.
- Dash - Click Left Thumbstick.
- Ground Smash - While in Air, Press Trigger.

- Race against your own time.
